name: Time To Cast
description:
IMPORTANT: This game is designed for mobile devices.  For the best experience, please open this page on your phone's browser, or download the apk on android.  You can play on desktop using your mouse, but it is not the intended way to play.

Time To Cast is an action roguelite where you use magic to slay slimes and skeletons.  Use gold coins to upgrade your mage and increase your magical powers!
